reasoning: Posterior circulation TIA (vertebrobasilar distribution) accounts for approximately 25-35% of all TIAs with incidence around 15 per 100k per year.
source: Caplan LR. (2000). Brain ischemia: basic concepts of cerebrovascular disease. In Mohr JP et al. (eds), Stroke: Pathophysiology, Diagnosis, and Management. Philadelphia: Lippincott Williams & Wilkins
